column3:
100年振りのハイラルか……
悪かねえ景色だ……
どうやら我が故郷も健在みてえだな
column4:
Hyrule looks pretty good from up here...
even after a hundred years.The ol' rolling grounds sure are a sight for sore eyes.

column3:
へっ ホントに……

悪かねえ景色だ
column4: Hey! Well look at that!Still going strong, indeed!

column3:
ようし これでいい……

いつでも ガノンの野郎に一発かませるぜ
column4:
Well, that oughta do it!We're set here, now we just
gotta wait for the perfect shot.

column3:
リンクが奴と戦う時 このルーダニアのドデカい一撃を
ガノンに お見舞いするって寸法だ……
column4:
Once Link is in the castle, Rudania will unleash
an epic blast.Ganon won't know what hit 'im!

column3: あははははっ……ははははははっ！！
大厄災の後 ゴロン族は どうなったかねえ？
column4:
I wonder how the Gorons fared
after the Great Calamity.

column3: 皆無事で元気なら良いんだが……
column4:
I sure hope everyone down there
is still going strong after every—
